General.sectionAddedBelow: Your section has been added below
General.name: Name
General.title: Title
General.searchMinInstructions: Enter a minimum of three characters to search
General.requiredFieldWarning: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory
General.emailSuccessfullyChangedDescription: To continue working please go to the dashboard.
General.emailNotChangedDescription: Your email address failed to change. You can try again later.
General.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for cannot be found
General.cancelDescription: If you leave this page, all your data <important>will be lost</important>.
General.itemsSelectedMessage: {count, plural, =0 {no followers yet} =1 {# item selected} other {# items selected}}.
General.addMasterAdminOnboardingDescription: The Master Admin is the first person to be invited to the dashboard and their role is to invite other contributors to the dashboard (Admins and Clients) and manage the content for the app.
General.onboardingLastStepDescriptionPartOne: If you want more information or in-depth guidance on how to use the app and dashboard, please see our additional resources. You can check implementation handbook and in-depth user guide
General.euDisclaimer: Funded by the European Union. Views and opinions expressed are however those of the author(s) only and do not necessarily reflect those of the European Union. Neither the European Union nor the granting authority can be held responsible for them.

ValidationMeseges.password: Please make sure your password meets the criteria.
ValidationMeseges.confirmPassword: Please make sure your passwords match.
ValidationMeseges.phone: Invalid phone number. Please try again.

Authorization.passwordInstructions: Min 8 and max 24 characters, 1 number and 1 symbol
Authorization.invalidLogin: Your password and/or email are invalid. Try again.

ForgotPassword.instructions: Enter the account's email address. A link will be sent to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.successInstructions2: click on the link. It will redirect you to the page where you can reset your password.
ForgotPassword.resendInstructions: If you didn't receive an email, please press the 'resend' button

PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.title: Password successfully changed
PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.instructions: Please login to your account again.

Admins.deleteAdminDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the Admin.
Admins.noListDataDescription: You can add multiple Admins. The Admins will be in charge of overseeing content for the Clients and adding Services.
Admins.addAdminDescription: Please note that <important>the Admin will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the dashboard.

Clients.deleteClientDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the client.
Clients.noListDataDescription: Here you will see a list of all the clients. Clients have the mandate to see data that is added by the Admins and Services, also add feedback for the services and post new orders.
Clients.addClientDescription: Please note that <important>the user will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the dashboard.

Services.deleteServiceDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the Service.
Services.noListDataDescription: Here you can manage all the services that are included in the business. Services can include all the services that are offered by the business or are needed for the business.
Services.addServiceDescription: Add a new service. Services help organize and categorize the different types of support and care provided.

Settings.emailInstructions: You must verify your new email before you can use it to log-in
Settings.emailVerificationDialogDescription: Verify the updated email. After confirming your email, log in to update it in your settings.
